scripts.install:all: npm i && cd frontend && npm i && cd ../backend && npm i
scripts.dev: npm run set_env:dev && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.prod: npm run set_env:prod && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.set_env:dev: firebase use default && cp environments/.env.frontend.dev frontend/.env && cp environments/.env.backend.dev backend/.env
scripts.set_env:prod: firebase use prod && cp environments/.env.frontend.prod frontend/.env && cp environments/.env.backend.prod backend/.env
